stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion for Strength and Sweet Blood
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a remarkable new potion! This elixir helps maintain a healthy balance in the body's humors and burns away excess, all while preserving the strength of the user. Unlike previous draughts, it doesn't diminish one's appetite, offering renewed vigor with fewer unpleasant side effects.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Unravel Mystery of the Northern Sea's Century-Old Chill
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Sages of the Seafaring Guild have finally understood the strange, lingering chill in the Great Northern Sea. They discovered it is caused by a long-term weakening of the mighty currents that usually bring warmth from sunnier lands. This slowdown affects the very breath of the world, altering winds and the flow of the seasons across many kingdoms.

stories.original_headline: A very human vision for going all-in on AI
stories.original_summary: It's easy to think about AI as a sort of existential battle between human and machine. Maybe it will be, someday, in a Skynet sort of way. stories.fantasy_headline: Scholars Explore Spirit-Machines as Aids, Not Replacements
stories.fantasy_story: Many ponder the rise of enchanted automatons, fearing a future clash between mortal ingenuity and spirit-machines. Yet, wise scholars propose a different path. They seek to use these thinking artifacts not as replacements for the human heart's wisdom, but as helpful tools. Imagine golem servants assisting craftsmen and scribes, rather than overshadowing their unique gifts!

stories.original_headline: What Google Glass got right — and really, really wrong
stories.original_summary: Google didn't invent the concept of smart glasses, but it did help make them mainstream. In retrospect, 13 years after their launch, this is both a good and bad thing. stories.fantasy_headline: The Seeing-Frames: A Mage-Guild's Fabled Enchantment
stories.fantasy_story: Long ago, a renowned Mage-Guild introduced wondrous seeing-frames to the realm, making enchanted spectacles known to many. These clever artifacts inspired dreams of interacting with arcane devices without peering into scrying pools all day. Yet, their widespread adoption brought both marvel and unforeseen challenges, forever changing how folks interacted with magic.
